name: Camper
ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): Minions who choose them will be drunk until dawn.
flavor: Sometimes a campfire is the easiest way to keep the evil ones at bay.

name: Census Officer
ability: One player begins the game with a Census token. Each night, learn the character type of the player with your token, and then the token moves to their clockwise neighbor.

name: Bird Watcher
ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): you will learn a hint about their role.
flavor: What birds fly above someone can tell a great lot about what they're up to.

name: Consultant
ability: Each night, you learn a piece of advice for a chosen Townsfolk character.
flavor: The book. The book knows it all.

name: Falconer
ability: Each night, choose a a player: when they die, learn their character.
flavor: The stench of death really gets the falcons in a stir. They often hunt the smaller scavengers that surround corpses.

name: Ranger
ability: Each night, choose a player. Learn a player they chose. If they chose nobody, or are the Demon, you receive arbitrary info.
flavor: Leave nothing but footprints, they say. Well, tire tracks are close enough.

name: Shuttle Driver
ability: Each night, choose a player: learn who they should choose to best help their team.
flavor: Shuttle's here! Leaving in 20!

name: Medic
ability: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): they live if they were to die tonight.
flavor: The animals of this woods are dangerous. The wounds I've had to patch up...

name: Hawkeye
ability: Each night*, choose a player: learn a number from 1 to 5 for how severely they lied yesterday. If they told nothing but the truth, you receive arbitrary information.
flavor: Constantly watching is the best way to sniff out lies.

name: Rescue Pilot
ability: Each night*, choose a player: everyone (not yourself) who chose them is drunk until dawn.
flavor: Whirrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr

name: Coroner
ability: Each night*, choose a dead player: you learn 1 good & 1 evil character, 1 of which is correct. You also learn if they died due to a Good or Evil ability.
flavor: How someone died can tell you quite a bit about the motives of the killer.

name: Vigilante
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: if not the Demon, they die.
flavor: Sometimes you need to take justice into your own hands.

otherNightReminder: A Minion dies if chosen by a Demon
name: Cryptozoologist
ability: The first night* you are chosen by a Demon, you are safe from the Demon and a Minion dies.
flavor: I'll find it. Don't you even question. See this footprint, here? Proof!

name: Cardmaster
ability: You start by choosing an alive player if they die, one player receives false information and another is drunk.
flavor: Ace up the sleeve, eh? It's not cheating, it's... playing creatively!

name: Cop
ability: Learn a statement. If the games ends and the statement is false, your team loses, even if dead.
flavor: You! You're under arrest!

name: Addict
ability: You have the ability of and believe you are an out-of-play Townsfolk. Townsfolk you choose will be drunk until dusk.
flavor: Sometimes the drugs take such a hold... I'll blackout and end up somewhere else.

name: Arms Dealer
ability: Each night*, choose a living player: if they are are Evil, someone might die.
flavor: Pfft, what do you mean? I don't sell no guns to criminals.

name: Disguiser
ability: Each night, choose a player: you will register as them and they will register as you to any Good abilities until dawn. If your chosen person dies at night, you are poisoned until dawn. Otherwise, you are sober.
flavor: The lost art of disguise; give me 10 minutes. I can fix your looks.

name: Poacher
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they die. You gain their ability.
flavor: Ivory, keratin, antler, anything. If it sells, I'll kill.

name: Werewolf
ability: Once per game, at night, choose to have all Townsfolk abilities receive false information. If you die, a player permanently receives false information.
flavor: Ahhwoooooooooooooooooooooooo!

name: Agent
ability: Each night, you learn part of the Grimoire. Your living neighbors might misregister as a different character.
flavor: Let me collect the information. Put the pieces together.

name: Sonsam
ability: Each night, choose a player: they gain the “is the demon” token. The player you chose the previous night dies. If you die, the player who “is the demon” becomes the Evil Sonsam. If only three players are alive, or a Sonsam has previously died, your ability is “Each night*, choose a player: they die.”
flavor: No, officer! It wasn't me! I was possessed!

name: Mikhil
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Once per game, you may also decide to have them register as alive. Good players who choose this player are poisoned.
flavor: What do you mean, I can't use corpses as fertilizer?

name: Lionsmane
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If they live, players who choose them might die, even if you are drunk or poisoned.

name: Vulture
ability: Each night*, a player dies. You gain the ability of players who die to your ability.

name: Mercenary
ability: You start knowing two opposing players, one being the Demon if you are Evil. If the one opposite to your alignment dies, choose two players tonight: they die. If the player of your alignment dies, you die tonight.

name: Botonist
ability: Each night, choose a player: they might be drunk or poisoned or might be sober.

name: Vampire
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they die. If they live, you may choose again. They will die the next time chosen by a death-inducing ability, even if unable to or the user is drunk or poisoned.
